AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial IV Legion heavy legionary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enlisted in the Imperial Legion. Looking for honor and glory [PAWN_pronoun] has finished basic training and has been assigned as a legionary of the IV Legion. Due to [PAWN_possessive]'s immense streangth they have been assigned as a heavy legionary, equipped with heavy armor and an even heavier sense of glory for the Empire.
